channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump and the dollar are doing something we saw just before the October 1987 stock market crash
item.description: The current political environment and currency market disruption are disturbingly similar.

item.title: ‘I’m considering giving up my U.S. citizenship’: I’m 39 and moving to the U.K. How should I invest my $30K savings?
item.description: “My credit cards are paid off monthly, but I finally paid off my student loans earlier this year.”

item.title: ‘I have never been asked for money before’: My friend wants to borrow $1,600 to pay her rent. Do I say yes?

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
